thread.section_title: London Marriott Hotel County Hall - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing accommodations
thread.title_full: Amazing accommodations - Review of London Marriott Hotel County Hall, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Schaiblefamily
title: Amazing accommodations
text: This hotel was amazing! The room was large and updated. It had every amenity that we could have wanted and the location was so wonderful. The subway station was just a few minute walk and the surrounding area is full of things to do within comfortable walking distance. Every staff member we met was more than friendly. We would absolutely stay here again and have already recommended it to friends and family.
